metadata.title: CVE-2023-3212 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - low
metadata.description:
A NULL pointer dereference issue was found in the gfs2 file system in theLinux kernel. It occurs on corrupt gfs2 file systems when the evict codetries to reference the journal descriptor structure after it has been freedand set to NULL. A privileged local user could use this flaw to cause akernel panic.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-3212` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.4.0-164-generic - 5.4.0-164.181
linux-image-5.4.0-164-generic-lpae - 5.4.0-164.181
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-164-generic - 5.4.0-164.181
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-164-lowlatency - 5.4.0-164.181
No subscription required

linux-image-5.15.0-83-generic - 5.15.0-83.92~20.04.1
